programme.title: PL: Arsenal v United 04/05

programme.desc: United Archives 22/8/11. The Reds welcomed Harry Redknapp's Spurs to Old Trafford seeking to defend their proud unbeaten run against the North London side.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 28/8/11. The Reds welcomed an Arsenal side who had made a slow start to the season. With the Gunners hampered by injuries and suspensions, could Sir Alex's men take advantage?

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/12. The Reds welcomed Newcastle for a Boxing Day clash that could allow them to stretch their advantage at the top of the table.

programme.title: PL: Aston Villa v United 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 29/3/14. The Reds were desperate to bounce back from derby disappointment when they took on Aston Villa at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: United v Swansea 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 12/5/13 . United took on Swansea looking to bring down the curtain in style as Sir Alex took charge of his final home game as United boss.

programme.title: PL: Blackburn v United 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 14/5/11. Sir Alex's side needed just one more point to secure a historic 19th league title.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The house is infested with termites in 'Ruthless People', then in 'What Wood Lincoln Do?', Lincoln has to complete a woodworking assignment, but has a history of failure on the topic. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lana learns her favourite fish are in jeopardy in 'Scales of Justice', then in 'Crimes of Fashion', Leni gets fired from her job, so Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) take on the case. (S3, ep 14)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats life-threatening chum, SpongeBob helps him with his 'Chum Bucket List', then in 'Big Baby Patrick', Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny sends Squidina to camp, so Patrick works with new staff in 'Is there a Director in the House?', then in 'Star Cruise', the Star family enjoys a cruise ship vacation... in outer space. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: 21 Dump Street: After Max is dumped, Phoebe tries to cheer him up by introducing him to another girl. However, Max's date steals Dr. Colosso when she sees Max's treatment of him. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Time Fighters - Part 1: When Drex escapes into the Time Jerker's time portal, Henry and Ray must go back into the past and stop him before he permanently alters Ray's past. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Bubble goes on an adventure with Firefly in 'Wobbly Tooth', then in 'The Darkest Night', Gargamel creates a switch that can turn off all the lights so that he can find the Smurf village. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel meets his nephews Dwayne and Rowena in 'Family Time', then in 'Smurf vs Machine', Handy is jealous of DD. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After getting rid of Ouchie, Pinkeye takes over the Star house in 'Get Ouch', and in 'Day of the Living Dad Jokes', Patrick and Squidina must find safety amidst the dad joke apocalypse. (S3, ep 12)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan gets Lori a job at the Burnt Bean in 'Trouble Brewing', then in 'The Cling and I', Lana tries to stop Lily from clinging to her. (S8, ep 13)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Second Wind: Knuckles the Dread's pirate crew rages against Dr. Deep and Dr. Done It. The Eggforcers triumph and take Dredd's shard, abandoning the captive Rusty Rose behind. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz in 'The Good Krabby Name', and in 'Move It or Lose It', Mr. Krabs and Plankton issue petitions to get their rival's restaurant bulldozed.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Save The Date: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Secrets in the Ice: On an expedition through some ice tunnels, the gang run into a future version of Nori. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Thumb Buddies Back: The Thumb Buddies return from space and are intent on getting revenge against Captain Man and Kid Danger. (S4, ep 21)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Up The Stairs!: Henry and Ray's friendship is put to the test when they must make the half mile trek up the stairs to make a surprise meal by a celebrity chef in Junk-N-Stuff. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Kiss Me, Nate: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead opposite a cute boy in the school play, and he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Dog Day After-School: Desperate to get Mom's tablet back after it is confiscated at school, Billy and Nora get help from Phoebe, who wants to prove she can be as sneaky as Max. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Big Dynomite: Mika and Chapa are determined to prove to Miles, Bose, and Ray that the new kid in school, Buddy Fudgers, is actually Lil' Dynomite, seeking revenge on his enemy, Captain Man. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Prom Wrecker: Tori is planning a prom, but the event ruins Jade's art project and she's out for revenge. Can Tori throw a prom with Jade aiming to bring the whole dance down? (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Personality Test: Lydia and Julie take a personality test to determine if they truly have the personality traits to be a Highly Popular Person. (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Brawl in the Hall: When Charlotte is challenged to a fight at school, Captain Man and Kid Danger step in to try and help Charlotte defend herself. (S4, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Rock Box Dump: When a report comes out that Kid Danger's super power is actually an illness, Kid Danger has to convince Swellview that it is a huge misunderstanding. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Bummer School: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. They realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: A Date with Atlantis: A tremor on Rock Island beach uncovers a mysterious portal to the lost civilisation of Atlantis! Unfortunately, Raquel finds the portal before the gang. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Mystery of the Forgotten Mystery: Taylor and her friends must save the island from an ancient piece of glass that wipes everyone's memories. Will they remember there is an island to save? (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Lil' Dynomite: When Danger Force accidentally forgets about plans they have with Ray, he surprises them with a brand new member of the team to make them jealous. (S1, ep 16)

programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Fake Brother: Grizzy builds a lookalike robot to keep the lemmings away while he prepares a party for she-bear. But his double is not as clever as Grizzy had hoped... (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mind in a Whirl: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzy is in love with thinks she's a lemming. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Lemmings!: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Flower Power: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Sound of a Lemming: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Construction Bear: Grizzy decides to build a building to impress she-bear. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Kung Fu Lemmings: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Oro's Secret: A blackout halts the Cup, but the Tikis can't wait: Nui is at stake! They go and seek a generator-like crystal in an ancient Aqua base. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Droners

programme.title: Jade Armor

programme.desc: Horsin' Around: Clawd must evade Bloodgood's horse, Nightmare, to catch the Blood Thirsty Bandit who's been stealing talismans. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Befana: Ladybug must face her own grandmother, akumatized into Befana. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Tomos a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in Tomos and friends' world today?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae straeon Twt yn mynd yn rhy bell ac yn arwain at broblemau i'w ffrindiau yn yr harbwr. Twt's storytelling gets out of hand and creates some problems for his friends in the harbour

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero'n clywed aderyn bach yn canu y tu allan i'w 'stafell, ond tydi o ddim yn deall be' mae'r aderyn yn ei ddweud. Blero hears a chirping bird but he can't understand what he's saying.

programme.title: Kim a Ct a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Ct ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Ct on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae Dwdl yn ceisio osgoi cwestiynau Odo am ei mam. Ond ar ol cael gwahoddiad adre, mae'n brofiad annisgwyl iawn. After meeting Doodle's mum, Odo has an unexpected experience.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ma Mabli ofn disgyn oddi ar ei beic newydd - a fydd hi'n gallu gorffen beicio gyda'i ffrindiau? Mabli worries she might fall off her new bike - will she finish the bike trail with her crew?

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Mae Costa Rica yn enwog am goedwigoedd cwmwl sy'n gartref i fywyd gwyllt egsotig fel y twcan a'r diogyn. Hefyd byddwn yn ymweld 'r brifddinas, San Jos. We take a trip to Costa Rica.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i Peredur Plagus ddwyn pob copi o rifyn newydd Panda Prysur, mae Jetboi a Dan Jerus yn dysgu cydweithio er mwyn ei drechu. Jetboi and Dan Jerus work together to defeat Peredur Plagus.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Gyda help Harri Hirgwt mae Bobl yn ymuno 'r Snwffs yn eu sioe awyr. Bobl gets to fly a kite at the Snwff Air Show with the help of Harri Hirgwt.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Cyfres i blant am anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn: anifeiliaid fferm. Series for children about the world's animals. This time: farm animals.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: A fydd gan Dewi'r hyder i berfformio fel cerflun byw ar ei ddiwrnod mawr yng Ngwyl Nol a Mlan? Dewi's plan is to raise money for the local festival by performing as a robot living statue!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Ar drip i'r traeth mae Pablo a'r anifeiliaid yn canu cn, ond pam bod cefnder Draff yn mynnu eu gwahardd rhag gwneud? Pablo is off to the beach when he and the animals decide to sing a song.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Osian a Cochyn o Barc y Scarlets i ddweud fod y gawod yn yr ystafell newid wedi torri. Harri gets a call from Parc y Scarlets to say that the shower is broken.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: 24 Thousand Ball Point Pens. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Budgie always wanted to make money. When he meets Inky Ballantine he gets involved in a financial caper. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: The Killer is Loose
programme.desc: 1956. Crime Drama. Director: Budd Boetticher. Stars Joseph Cotten, Rhonda Fleming & Wendell Corey. A crazed convict escapes prison to seek revenge on the detective who accidently killed his wife. [S]

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: 1933. Drama. Directed by George Pearson. Starring O.B. Clarence, Jack Hawkins & Michael Shepley. The reading of the will held on the estate proves to be rather more tricky than was thought. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Gunfighter. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Dick Kallman & John Pickard. When Bill stops a trail boss from harassing a saloon girl, the humiliated boss uses an eager young man to get his revenge. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Dizzy Rich. 1964. Stars Barbara Mitchell, Arnold Diamond & Willie Payne. A man in a bowler hat comes looking for Hetty, but why? Meanwhile, Alf gets into trouble with his investment suggestions. [S]

programme.title: Midnight At Madame Tussauds
programme.desc: 1936. Crime. A financier accepts a bet to spend a night in the Chamber of Horrors. Starring James Carew, Charles Oliver & Lucille Lisle.

programme.title: Freedom To Die
programme.desc: 1961. Directed by Francis Searle Stars Bruce Seton, Felicity Young, Kay Callard & Paul Maxwell. Neat Crime drama of a hidden underworld where crime really doesn't pay. [S]

programme.title: Impact (1963)
programme.desc: 1963. Drama. Jack Moir (Conrad Phillips of 'William Tell' fame), a newspaper reporter, is framed by 'The Duke' (George Pastell), a Soho racketeer against whom he has written a series of articles. [S]

programme.title: On the Fiddle
programme.desc: 1961. Comedy. Directed by Cyril Frankel. Stars Alfred Lynch, Sean Connery & Cecil Parker. A couple of loveable service dodgers avoid the front line until they are sent to France. [S]

programme.title: Dublin Nightmare
programme.desc: 1958. Thriller. Directed by John Pomeroy. Stars William Sylvester & Marla Landi. A photographer investigates the murder of his friend, which occurred during a bank robbery for The Cause. [S]

programme.title: St. Benny the Dip
programme.desc: 1951. Comedy. Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. Stars Roland Young, Nina Foch & Dick Haymes. Three con artists unexpectedly wind up on the road to reformation while posing as priests to pull off a job. [S]

programme.title: Conflict of Wings
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by John Eldridge. Stars John Gregson, Muriel Pavlow & Kieron Moore. Villagers take action when they find that a nearby RAF station is taking over a much loved bird sanctuary. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts Go Fishing. 1964. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Mark Tapscott & Glenn Stensel. Encouraged by Mr Drysdale, the Clampetts go on an unusual fishing trip at the famed Marineland of the Pacific. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1957. Inside Information. Director: Montgomery Tully. Starring Ronald Adam, Basil Hendon and Colette Wilde. A murder hunt is launched after a real body is used as the 'guy' on bonfire night.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Blood on the Land. 1960. Stars Pernell Roberts, Everett Sloane & Ken Lynch. When Ben tries to stop the Drummonds from grazing his herd on the Ponderosa, Adam gets caught and is taken hostage. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Iron Ponds/Lobster Breeding. 1986. Jack Hargreaves fishes one of the hundreds of little ponds of Kent, relics of the iron age. He then visits a lobster research station. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: It's a Goon Show Special! Mike and Noel share some interesting rare lost reels from the Goon Preservation Society, and there's a special guest! And do you remember making an Origami Rupert? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1975. How About a Cup of Tea? Stars Alfred Burke, Ray Smith & Peter Childs. Bruised & battered during his last case, Marker receives a surprise visitor to his hospital bed. [S]

programme.title: The Anderson Tapes (1971)
programme.desc: 1971. Crime Thriller. Directed by Sidney Lumet. Starring Martin Balsam, Dyan Cannon, Sean Connery, Christopher Walken. A habitual criminal looks for funding to set up his next robbery. [S]

programme.title: Timeslip
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Directed by Ken Hughes. Stars Gene Nelson, Faith Domergue & Joseph Tomelty. A body is recovered from the Thames and reporter, Delaney, identifies the man as being a nuclear physicist.

programme.title: Svengali
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Pretty young Trilby (Hildegard Neff) falls under the spell of Svengali, the evil hypnotist. Starring Donald Wolfit, Jeremy Brett and Harry Secombe. [S]

programme.title: Svengali
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Pretty young Trilby (Hildegard Neff) falls under the spell of Svengali, the evil hypnotist. Starring Donald Wolfit, Jeremy Brett and Harry Secombe. [S]

programme.title: Pot O' Gold
programme.desc: 1941. Musical starring James Stewart, Paulette Goddard and Horace Heidt. Jimmy, the owner of a failed music shop, goes to work with his uncle, the owner of a food factory. [S]

programme.title: Bindle
programme.desc: 1966. Comedy. Directed by Peter Saunders. Stars Alfie Bass, Johnny Wade & Carmel McSharry. A brilliant comedy about an accident prone furniture remover and his friend. [S]

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The Killer. 1957. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Lane Bradford & House Peters Jr. Dave Bennett hires a killer to take out Wyatt Earp after the marshal kicked him out of Wichita for a crooked game of cards. [S]

programme.title: Band of Thieves
programme.desc: 1962. Musical Comedy with Acker Bilk, Jimmy Thompson, Jennifer Jayne, Geoffrey Sumner & Maudie Edwards. One of the truly great Trad' Jazz films of all time. [S]

programme.title: Murder at the Windmill
programme.desc: 1949. Crime Drama. Directed by Val Guest. Stars Garry Marsh, Jack Livesey & Jon Pertwee. Two London detectives order the repeat of a stage show after a spectator is shot during a performance. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout July. [S]

programme.title: Now Barabbas Was a Robber
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by Gordon Parry. Stars Richard Greene, Cedric Hardwicke & Kathleen Harrison. Prison drama about a variety of criminals and their life behind bars in post-war Britain. [S]

programme.title: The Bigamist
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Ida Lupino. Stars Joan Fontaine, Ida Lupino & Edmund Gwenn. A man secretly married to two women begins to feel the pressure of his deception. [S]

programme.title: Law and Disorder (1940)
programme.desc: 1940. Comedy/Crime. Directed by David MacDonald. Stars Alastair Sim, Barry K. Barnes & Diana Churchill. A young solicitor takes to defending successfully a number of thugs accused of sabotage. [S]

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: 1996. Drama. Director: Richard Laxton. Stars John Bowe, Mel Martin, Michael Attwell. Set in the 19th century, this epic tale follows the Poldark family, their tangled destinies and a family feud. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Return To Arms
programme.desc: 1960. A visit to Germany to find out what kind of army the country is raising today, with a focus on the mountain troops and how they train.

programme.title: Small Hotel
programme.desc: 1957. Comedy. Director: David Mcdonald. Stars Gordon Harker, Marie Lohr, John Lode & Billie Whitelaw. At a small hotel, Albert, an aged but shrewd waiter, is a past master at the art of fiddling. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Ricochet. 1963. Directed by John Moxey. Stars Maxine Audley, Richard Leech & Alex Scott. Yvonne Phipps is terrified by an intruder in the bushes and learns how to use a gun for their return. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance
programme.desc: The Doctor and the Countess. 1954. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars Charles Boyer, Paula Raymond & Carleton Young. A plastic surgeon is asked to disfigure the face of a countess. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Dead Ringers. 1966. Stars Adam West, Liberace & Burt Ward. Batman and Robin escape Chandell's trap and plot to outsmart him and put a stop to his malicious plan. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Special Branch. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Martin Benson & Richard Bebb. A team of assassins plan to kill an American atomic scientist on his arrival in London. [S]

programme.title: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director Roy Ward Baker. Stars Hardy Kruger, Colin Gordon & Michael Goodliffe. A German flight officer is shot down over England and makes numerous attempts to escape to fight again. [S]
